subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Matz, a 24-year-old left-hander who had pitched two impressive games for the Mets, has a partially torn muscle and has been ordered not to throw a baseball for at least three weeks.
snippet: Matz, a 24-year-old left-hander who had pitched two impressive games for the Mets, has a partially torn muscle and has been ordered not to throw a baseball for at least three weeks.
